member.name: T:TPMeshEditor.FileOperations
member.summary: Class that holds the current directory and provides the list of files to work on.
member.remarks: Initialised on startup, globally available within assembly. Actually more similar to a struct, using properties more than usual rather than methods.

member.name: F:TPMeshEditor.FileOperations.log
member.summary: Internal log file.

member.name: F:TPMeshEditor.FileOperations.inputDirectory
member.summary: Input directory; accessed through property.

member.name: M:TPMeshEditor.FileOperations.#cctor
member.summary: Initialises the class with all the information the programme needs.

member.name: P:TPMeshEditor.FileOperations.FileFormats
member.summary: File formats that need to be discovered by the programme.
member.remarks: Initialised in the default parameterless constructor. Not meant to be modified by the user.

member.name: P:TPMeshEditor.FileOperations.InputDirectory
member.summary: Current input directory.

member.name: P:TPMeshEditor.FileOperations.Files
member.summary: Correct-format files currently in the directory.

member.name: M:TPMeshEditor.FileOperations.PeekLog
member.summary: Returns the log without deleting it.

member.name: M:TPMeshEditor.FileOperations.DumpLog
member.summary: Returns the log and deletes it (like flushing a stream).
member.remarks: This function should be preferred to PeekLog.

member.name: M:TPMeshEditor.FileOperations.FillFileList
member.summary: Fills file list.
member.remarks: Use this and not FindFiles directly.

member.name: M:TPMeshEditor.FileOperations.FindFiles(System.String)
member.summary: Internal functions that finds all files with the desired extension. Do not use directly.
member.returns: list of files with the correct extension.
member.remarks: Only for internal use; should only read from - and write to - internal variables. Used during initialisation to fill the file list.

member.name: M:TPMeshEditor.MainForm.OpenToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Function to open Folder Select dialog.

member.name: F:TPMeshEditor.MainForm.components
member.summary: Required designer variable.

member.name: M:TPMeshEditor.MainForm.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:TPMeshEditor.MainForm.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

member.name: T:TPMeshEditor.Data4Bytes
member.summary: Represents 4 bytes of data, like a C/C++ union.
member.remarks: Properties are used to access byte and short arrays to avoid size mismatch.

member.name: M:TPMeshEditor.TPMesh.TPVertex.#ctor(TPMeshEditor.Data4Bytes[])
member.summary: Initialises the vertex from a raw data array.

member.name: M:TPMeshEditor.TPMesh.TPVertex.#ctor(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Initialises the vertex from single values. Calls an internal setup function.

member.name: M:TPMeshEditor.Program.Main
member.summary: The main entry point for the application.

member.name: T:TPMeshEditor.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:TPMeshEditor.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:TPMeshEditor.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
